article_title: The Morning Download: IBM Watson Platform Puts Algorithm-Driven Business to the Test
article_text:
Peter J. Smith for The Wall Street Journal

As a business proposition, IBM’s new unit, known as the Cognitive Business Solutions Group, puts to the test many of the ideas that are germinating here at the Gartner Inc. Symposium/ITxpo. The API-driven, algorithm-heavy, bi-modal digital business based on the hybrid cloud. reads like a mash-up of all 811 events here.
